entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSIF fails to generate for some projects with "Could not load file or assembly `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp, Version=4.0.0.0".... #64491
  • Suggested UX for Inline Diagnostics #64474
  • Assertion hit when removing RuntimeSupportsByRefFields setter #64471
  • CSharpCommandLineParser does not set CompilationOptions.StrongNameProvider when "/keyfile:..." is used #64468
  • Using `KeyValuePair<,>` can result in null reference runtime errors which are not caught by the compiler #64467
  • Allow "Convert cast" refactorings to work with nullable value types #64466
  • Autocompletion suggests `struct` after `sealed record` #64465
  • IDE1006 should trigger build failed #64464
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64463
  • Roslyn could not load assembly when CreateFromStream method is used. #64462

Closed

  • auto completion issue #45782
    Backlog
  • Required member nullable warnings are not restored when missing `: base()` on a `[SetsRequiredMember]` constructor #63768
    17.4
  • Update docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #64268
    17.5
  • Reduce typing delay caused by import completion #52814
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzer info for detecting IntPtr/UintPtr behavioral changes #64485
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dependency on ms.extensions.dependencyinjection from roslyn lsp #64481
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Experimental api support for HostOutputs #64478
    Area-Compilers
  • Add additional information to help F# with navigating to symbols #64475
    Area-IDE
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - change filter to keep old snippets in if replacement does not exist #64459
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not inline fault-helper #64480
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add "target type match" filter support to enum and static members providers #64477
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to simplified helper extension for reading data from a stream #64476
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add back accidentally deleted activity id correlation #64479
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64483
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64473
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Fix LSIF handling of extension methods #64460
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update help link URI for code style diagnostics #64438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve CLaSP doc comments #64446
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix out of bounds error when doing speculative operations #64454
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64456
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
